generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a large white arrow painted on it, indicating it is a road for vehicles.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, with pedestrians walking on them and a curb separating them from the road.
- building: Several buildings are visible along the street, including modern high-rise structures and lower commercial buildings.
- wall: A concrete wall with graffiti is visible on the left side of the image, adjacent to the sidewalk.
- fence: A metal fence is visible along the left side of the road, separating the sidewalk from a lower area.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including traffic light poles and utility poles along the street.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersections, with some showing green lights.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible along the sidewalk and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, appearing clear and blue.
- person: Several people are visible walking or standing on the sidewalk, including a group of young people near the bicycle.
- car: A dark-colored car is visible in the middle of the road, and another car is visible further ahead.
- bus: A blue bus is visible in the background, stopped at a bus stop.
- train: A train is visible in the background, running on tracks parallel to the road.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the left side of the image, being ridden or held by a person.
- truck: No truck is visible in the image.
- terrain: No terrain (grass, soil, etc.) is visible in the image.
